content: Oh Alison, don’t you realize that you already have surpassed anything I could ever give to you myself? Your baring and sharing of your soul with the rest of the world trumps any one gesture on my part. Besides, I wouldn’t ever wish for, dream of or in any way expect a response to anything I might say. The gift of your love, however, is so graciously received, cherished, and sincerely appreciated. Please, don’t hesitate to reach out to me if I can be of assistance.
